attributes.action: Kurds in Rojava, Northeast Syria, facing genocide
attributes.additional_details: We urge you to fulfil your humanitarian and moral obligations and for the British government to raise awareness, as a powerful nation within the United Nations, to take immediate action against these crimes committed against the Kurds in North-eastern Syria.
attributes.background: To use their power to call an urgent meeting within the international community to stop the genocide taking place in North-eastern Syria against the Kurds in Rojava.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

UK must act now & condemn the killing of Kurdish civilians in Rojava & Rojhilat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756419

Condemn attacks on Kurds in North Syria & use diplomatic pressure to bring peace
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756339
